prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: A Writer's Capital, Accession #9121-r, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library by Louis Auchincloss on 1996 November 26.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consist of two copies of Auchincloss's "A Writer's Capital," including a holograph manuscript with extensive holograph revisions by the author; and a typed manuscript also with extensive holograph revisions.
This is an autobiographical work by the novelist, Louis Auchincloss, with extensive holograph changes and corrections made by the author.

This is an autobiographical work by the novelist, Louis Auchincloss, with extensive holograph changes and corrections made by the author. The book was published in 1974 by the University of Minnesota Press.
